name: Garlic
properties: Weight-loss booster proven in clinical trials
Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
Can be used as powder or fresh
benefits: Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled studies have found that as little as a daily 1/4 teaspoon of garlic powder can reduce body fat at a cost of a few pence a day. Featured prominently in soups and vegetable dishes for weight loss.
amount: 1/4 teaspoon of garlic powder daily (or equivalent fresh garlic)

quotes: Garlic Powder (¼ teaspoon) Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled studies have found that as little as a daily ¼ teaspoon of garlic powder can reduce body fat at a cost of a few pence a day.
